title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off Sovereign 350  SGC 40
author: packs

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb Bat Off Sovereign 350  SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Hi All,

Up for sale is a seldom seen Sovereign 350 backed Ty Cobb Bat Off graded a 40 by SGC. There is one small wrinkle visible in the scan. I can't tell if it's green or green apple or what have you, but there's a nice clean scan of the back as well. Great looking card. 

Sold.
